name: Jason's Just Job 1: Pizza
description:
You are Jason. A struggling 20-something-year-old who just needs money, NOW! You decide to get a job at the local pizza place, 'PIXELESSPIZZA".

You task is to deliver pizza around the neighborhood. You drive a moped around the streets of 'Piskel Village'. However, be careful, if you crash too much - the pizza gets destroyed and you're fired! Ouh no, no summer vacation!

Features in current build:

RANDOMIZED PIZZA ORDERERS

PIZZA DAMAGE DETECTOR
Features coming soon:

SHOP
